mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: McKenzie, Lewis to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: McKenzie, Lewis
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Dated Alexandria Nov 21st 1861. Rec'd Washington, 1861. , o'clock, min. M. To Gov Pierpont Some Hotel How long will you remain. Want see you. Our City Council under wheeling Government organizes tomorrow Ten oclock Can you come. Lewis McKenzie Mayor 21/42 C/G
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: McKenzie, Lewis
Alexandria, Virginia
Washington, D.C.
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
